div.pre: 1602 Capernaum, Galilee, 1957 Burial: c. 125 B.C. (Westermark) Contents: 78 AR Demetrius II, 1st reign: 1 tetradr. (Tyre) Antiochus VII: 25 tetradr.; 5 didr. (Tyre) Demetrius II, 2nd reign: 44 tetradr.; 3 didr. (Tyre, latest yr. 187 S.E.) Disposition: dispersed Seyrig, Tr√©sors du Levant (in press)
